tool.name: OGS: appendLinesAlongPolyline
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'appendLinesAlongPolyline'.
tool.command: appendLinesAlongPolyline #for $f in $mesh_input_file: --mesh-input-file '$f' #end for #for $f in $geo_file: --geo-file '$f' #end for #for $f in $gmsh_path: --gmsh-path '$f' #end for --mesh-output-file output_1.vtu

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: the name of the file containing the input mesh

param.name: geo_file
param.label: geo file
param.help: the name of the input geometry file which contains polylines

param.name: gmsh_path
param.label: gmsh path
param.help: the path to the input gmsh binary file

tool.help: This tool runs the **appendLinesAlongPolyline** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
